product_name: The North Face Standard Issue Ear Gear Headband
long_description: An outdoor classic updated with FlashDry(TM) technology, the Standard Issue Ear Gear headband from The North Face keeps your ears warm and dry when you're cross-country skiing and running. Plush polyester fleece features the FlashDry(TM) fabric additive that dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out.
short_description: An outdoor classic updated with FlashDry(TM) technology, the Standard Issue Ear Gear headband from The North Face keeps your ears warm and dry when you're cross-country skiing and running.
